ANU.name: Kevin Windle
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
expertise: Central And Eastern European Languages Incl. Russian
Central And Eastern European Literature Incl. Russian
interest: Modern Russian and Polish literature, Slavonic lexicography and Translation Studies, the history of Russian settlement in Australia, the Comintern and Australia.
ANU.biography: 2021: shortlisted for NSW Premier's prize for literary translation, for the translation of Artyom Vesyoly's 'Russia Washed in Blood' (Anthem Press, London & New York).
project: Translation of selected short works by Ivan Sokolov-Mikitov.
